item.title: Need a video editor to create videos for YouTube from a script. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team and help create engaging and high-quality videos for our YouTube channel. We will provide the script and audio files, and we need someone who can bring these elements to life by sourcing and adding visual elements and editing the content into a cohesive and captivating video.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit and assemble raw footage into a polished final product.
- Source and incorporate stock footage, images, clips, charts, and animations to enhance the video's impact (no footage will be provided).
- Ensure the video aligns with the script and audio provided.
- Incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions to meet quality standards.
- Optimize videos for YouTube, ensuring they are engaging and well-formatted for the platform.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with content tailored for YouTube.
- Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling and pacing.
- Ability to work with provided scripts and audio files.
- Experience in sourcing and using stock footage.
- Attention to detail and a creative eye for design.
- Ability to meet deadlines and work independently.

**Payment:**
- $100 to $200 per video, depending on the complexity and quality of work.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 22, 2024 04:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Narrative Video, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Documentary, Narrative Video, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for 2d Stick Figure Animation - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a skilled video editor to create high-quality edits for our YouTube channel. This is a long-term opportunity with room for growth.

Role Requirements:
- Edit videos ranging from 8-14 minutes, with some longer.
- Quick turnaround for a regular posting schedule of 1 video per week.
- Fast response times.
- Good understanding of storytelling and YouTube retention.
- Proficient in English and video editing software like Adobe Animate, Adobe Premiere Pro.

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://www.youtube.com/@Kelevins
https://www.youtube.com/@ChatHistory
https://www.youtube.com/@TrustMeBroOfficial

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 22, 2024 04:40 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Create Inspirational Youtube Video with Speaking Content - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who can find good clips from speaking videos, like this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1Aee_qZnDM&t=1s , and turn them into shorter cool inspirational videos. 2-6 minutes long.

Like Youtube automation (where I just give you a video then you pull out several clips and turn them into something amazing).

I'd pay per video created but idea is that we create several.

Examples of final:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WDoh6S6RimI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5YNmNd2ncw0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2OJ4dczhqNY
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0b2MtFQk_aU

Budget: $30

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Video Editing - Background Noise Removal - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can remove background noise from a video with a speaker in a public place. The background noise includes wind, music, and people talking. The editor should have experience in noise reduction techniques and be able to deliver high-quality results. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure that the edited video maintains its clarity and coherence.
    Relevant skills:
    - Video editing
    - Noise reduction
    - Audio editing
    - Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 04:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.title: Create Political Videos - Upwork
item.description:
The script and audio are complete.  We need your help with creating the video/video editing based off of the audio and the script.   We are looking for documentary style videos like @johnnyharris on youtube.  And like this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZKirTmyvJsU&t=2s

The first video we need done is 16:44 long.  Please provide proposal for this length and quality.

Here is what we are looking for in a video editor:
1. fast turnaround
2. competitive price - we are looking for a long-term relationship and have many videos for you if you are good and have a good price.
3. quality video like the example
4. friendly to work with

Thanks,
Dan

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 22, 2024 04:25 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply
